id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(SYN, IDENT) with container statements

query.querystr: if i; Select i such that Modifies(i,"z")

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(INT, WILDCARD) is False

query.querystr: assign assign; Select assign such that Modifies(7, _)

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(INT, IDENT) is True

query.querystr: assign assign; Select assign such that Modifies(3, "z")

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(INT, IDENT) is False

query.querystr: assign assign; Select assign such that Modifies(2, "x")
stmt s; Select s such that Modifies(s, _)

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(SYN, WILDCARD) with irrelevant SYN

query.querystr: assign a, a1; stmt s; Select a such that Modifies(s,_)
assign a, a1; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a,v)
assign a, a1; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a,"z")

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(SYN, IDENT) with irrelevant synonym

query.querystr: assign a, a1; variable v; Select a such that Modifies(a1 ,"z" )

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select Modifies(INT, WILDCARD) is True

query.querystr: assign assign; Select assign such that Modifies(3, _)

id.comment: (Valid Query) Select variables with Modifies(INT, SYN)

query.querystr: variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1,v)
variable v ; Select v such that Modifies( 1, v)
assign a; assign a1; print p1,p2,p3,p4,p5,p6; variable v; Select v such that Modifies(1,v)
assign pattern; variable Select; Select pattern such that Modifies(pattern,Select)
